full_threads.body:
Hi Montana, 

You're very welcome!

I've now updated the headings to be bold and changed their color to burgundy as requested.

Here's the link:
https://performhr.com.au/the-nervous-system-of-change-how-ld-keeps-modern-workforces-alive/

Please feel free to have a look and let me know if there's anything else you'd like adjusted.

Thanks so much Rica

Can you just make the following headings bold and the colour burgundy.
1. Align Learning to Business - or Risk Becoming Disconnected

2. Embrace Data, Not Just Gut Instinct

3. Internal Mobility Starts with Skills Agility

Montana O'Beid

Brand and Marketing Manager

M.

0423 760 010

E.

montana.obeid@performhr.com.au

W.

performhr.com.au







Click here to view our Legal Disclaimer.

Hi Montana,

Apologies for the inconvenience earlier.

I’ve corrected the formatting on the page. You can view the updated version here:
The Nervous System of Change – How L&D Keeps Modern Workforces Alive

Please don’t hesitate to let me know if you need any further assistance.

Thank you so much Rica.

May I ask with the formatting. The heading seems to be lighter than the body copy underneath.

Would it be possible to make the headings BOLD and the body copy underneath just the normal font.

See attached reference.

Let me know if that makes sense.

Montana O'Beid

Brand and Marketing Manager

M.

0423 760 010

E.

montana.obeid@performhr.com.au

W.

performhr.com.au







Click here to view our Legal Disclaimer.

Hi Montana,

Confirming that I have made the updates.

Here's the link:
https://performhr.com.au/the-nervous-system-of-change-how-ld-keeps-modern-workforces-alive/

Let me know if you need further assistance.

Hi Rica

Sorry one other thing, the captions should not be underlined. My mistake as it was in the native word document. I will ensure this doesn't happen again.

Montana O'Beid

Brand and Marketing Manager

M.

0423 760 010

E.

montana.obeid@performhr.com.au

W.

performhr.com.au







Click here to view our Legal Disclaimer.

Morning Rica Just a few edits if you can please support:
  • The large pull-out quote has double quotation marks "" at the beginning and end of the quote.
  • The following bullet point has double bullet points, can you please remove one of the line bullet points
    • 87% of L&D pros say they can clearly demonstrate business value by helping employees transition internally.
  • There is copy that is randomly italicised in the following statement can you please revert to the regular font.
    • Mobility isn't a buzzword - it's how you keep your best talent in motion rather than out the door.
  • There is also italicsed copy in the following statement if you can please revert to the regular font.
    • As Heineken's Geraldine Murphy puts it: "L&D pros must help employees prioritise three things: the job they do now, the job they want next, and the skills that will serve them for life."
  • We have constant reference to the word "Pros", would you be able to do a global replacement from Pro > Professionals. I do apologise this is something I reflected on this morning and would like to change.
Thank you so much for your support, as always. Montana O'Beid Brand and Marketing Manager M. 0423 760 010 E. montana.obeid@performhr.com.au W. performhr.com.au Click here to view our Legal Disclaimer.

Hi Montana, 

Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here are the links: 
https://performhr.com.au/blog/
https://performhr.com.au/the-nervous-system-of-change-how-ld-keeps-modern-workforces-alive/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Any questions please let me know.

Thank you. Have a wonderful day.





Montana O'Beid
